io.spire.api
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  io.spire.api.Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
Account, Account.Origin, Billing, Billing.Plan, Billing.Plan.Features, Billing.Plan.Features.Queue, BillingInvoice, BillingSubscription, BillingSubscription.BillingInvoices, Channel, Channel.Channels, Events, Message, Session, Subscription, Subscription.Subscriptions
public abstract class Resource
extends Object

General abstraction of Api resources

Since:
1.0

initialize

protected abstract void initialize()
This is called automatically by the resource constructor to initialize any other internal properties. Derived classes should override this method adding any custom initialization needed by the class

updateModel

protected void updateModel(Map<String,Object> rawModel)
Updates the underlying resource model when GET/UPDATE a resource Subclasses would want to override this method if any special operations need to done in regards of how the model should be updated

Parameters:
rawModel - is a representation of the raw model as a Map
